name: Inlight
description:
INLIGHT is an action / shooter game where the sake of your tribe lies solely in your hands. Your focus, accuracy, and patience will be put to the ultimate test as you cleanse the world from its curse. Defeat legions of foes with your spells, upgrade your skills, unlock new abilities to fit your playstyle and delve into the mysterious past of the island of Az'kalar.

Only light must prevail, will you stand up to the challenge?

Key Features:

  • Immersive 2D graphics
  • Items, relics and spells to unlock
  • Challenging difficulty
  • Various game modes
  • A mysterious back-story
  • An original blend between genres
  • Runs smoothly in 4K / 60 FPS
